text: The Per Brahe Secondary School () is a secondary school in Jönköping in Sweden. It has traditions dated back to the 17th century. The current building was opened on 18 October 1913. Since 2007, the school has UN certification.Certifierade FN-skolor / == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Buildings and structures in Jönköping Category:Schools in Sweden
title: Per Brahe Secondary School
